item.title: Ansible - Automation Swiss Knife
item.description: This blog post is an introduction to different components of Ansible - an automation tool that I am using at Zenatix to automate some of the DevOps stuff. It’s a pretty useful tool and has been very helpful to me. I needed something really simple and that’s why I opted for Ansible. So What’s Ansible ? Ansible is an automation system. With Ansible, you can handle configurations, perform ad-hoc commands across your servers, copy files to-and-fro from your machines.
